title: Haikus File Schema
description: Schema for validating haikus in the haikus.json file

text.description: The haiku text, consisting of three lines separated by newline characters

image.description: The filename of the image associated with the haiku

author.description: The name of the author of the haiku

date_created.description: The date when the haiku was created, in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD)

tags.description: Tags or categories for the haiku

alt_text.description: Alternative text for the image, for accessibility
